properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
TUNISIA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, YELLOW HULL, SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD,
   IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE BETWEEN EL HAOURIA
   (37-03N 011-01E) AND 38-00N 011-00E.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1795/17.
